sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R ,M.* FROM ( SELECT T.DMDM, T.DMMC, T.DMLX, T.DLST, T.BZ, Z.XZQH, X.GXDW FROM BZDZ_ADD_DMXXB T, (SELECT A.DMDM,TO_CHAR(LISTAGG(A.PCSMC,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY PCSMC)) GXDW FROM (SELECT Z.DMDM, Z.PCSDM, P.ORGNAME PCSMC FROM BZDZ_ADD_DMZZJGB Z, ORG_ORGANIZATION P WHERE Z.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND P.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND P.ORGCODE = Z.PCSDM
Z.FXJDM = #dmxxb.fxjdm#
Z.PCSDM = #dmxxb.pcsdm# ) A GROUP BY A.DMDM) X, (SELECT B.DMDM,TO_CHAR(LISTAGG(B.XZQH,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY B.XZQH)) XZQH FROM (SELECT X.DMDM, T.CT XZQH FROM BZDZ_ADD_DMXZQHB X, SYS_DICT2 T WHERE X.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.ZDBH = 'D_BZ_XZQH' AND X.XZQHDM = T.DM
X.XZQHDM = #dmxxb.xzqhdm# ) B GROUP BY B.DMDM) Z WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.DMDM = X.DMDM AND T.DMDM = Z.DMDM
(T.DMMC||T.DMPY||T.DMWB LIKE '%$dmxxb.dmmc$%')
)M WHERE ROWNUM <= #end# ) WHERE R > #begin#

SELECT COUNT(T.DMID) FROM BZDZ_ADD_DMXXB T, (SELECT A.DMDM,TO_CHAR(LISTAGG(A.PCSMC,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY PCSMC)) GXDW FROM (SELECT Z.DMDM, Z.PCSDM, P.ORGNAME PCSMC FROM BZDZ_ADD_DMZZJGB Z, ORG_ORGANIZATION P WHERE Z.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND P.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND P.ORGCODE = Z.PCSDM
Z.FXJDM = #dmxxb.fxjdm#
Z.PCSDM = #dmxxb.pcsdm# ) A GROUP BY A.DMDM) X, (SELECT B.DMDM,TO_CHAR(LISTAGG(B.XZQH,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY B.XZQH)) XZQH FROM (SELECT X.DMDM, T.CT XZQH FROM BZDZ_ADD_DMXZQHB X, SYS_DICT2 T WHERE X.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.ZDBH = 'D_BZ_XZQH' AND X.XZQHDM = T.DM
X.XZQHDM = #dmxxb.xzqhdm# ) B GROUP BY B.DMDM) Z WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.DMDM = X.DMDM AND T.DMDM = Z.DMDM
(T.DMMC||T.DMPY||T.DMWB LIKE '%$dmxxb.dmmc$%')

SELECT COUNT(T.DMID) FROM BZDZ_ADD_DMXXB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0'
(T.DMMC||T.DMPY||T.DMWB LIKE '%$dmxxb.dmmc$%')
SELECT * FROM BZDZ_ADD_DMXXB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ='0' AND T.DMDM = #dmdm#
SELECT * FROM BZDZ_ADD_DMXZQHB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ='0' AND T.DMDM = #dmdm#
SELECT * FROM BZDZ_ADD_DMZZJGB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ='0' AND T.DMDM = #dmdm#

SELECT S.CT AS XZQHMC FROM BZDZ_ADD_DMXXB T, BZDZ_ADD_DMXZQHB X,SYS_DICT2 S WHERE X.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.DMMC = #dmmc# AND T.DMLX = #dmlx# AND X.XZQHDM = #xzqhdm# AND S.ZDBH = 'D_BZ_XZQH' AND X.XZQHDM = S.DM AND T.DMDM = X.DMDM
T.DMID != #dmid#
SELECT SUBSTR(MAX(DMDM), 1, 2) || LPAD(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(DMDM), 3)) + 1, 4, '0') DMDM FROM BZDZ_ADD_DMXXB WHERE XT_ZXBZ='0' AND DMDM LIKE SUBSTR(#xzqhdm#, 5, 2) || '%'
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_DMXXB
DMMC = #dmmc#
DMPY = #dmpy#
DMWB = #dmwb#
DLST = #dlst#
, BZ = #bz# ,
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND DMID = #dmid#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO BZDZ_ADD_DMXXB (dmid
dmdm
dmmc
dmlx
dlst
dmpy
dmwb
bz
,
)values( #dmid#
#dmdm#
#dmmc#
#dmlx#
#dlst#
#dmpy#
#dmwb#
#bz#
,
)

INSERT INTO BZDZ_ADD_DMZZJGB (DMZZJGID
DMDM
ZRQDM
PCSDM
FXJDM
,
)values( #dmzzjgid#
#dmdm#
#zrqdm#
#pcsdm#
#fxjdm#
,
)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_DMXXB
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND DMDM = #dmdm#

UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_DMXZQHB
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND DMDM = #dmdm#

UPDATE BZDZ_ADD_DMZZJGB
WHERE XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND DMDM = #dmdm#
sqlMap.select: SELECT SDE.ST_ASTEXT(P.SHAPE) AS COORDS, P.OBJECTID, P.NAME, P.PCSMC FROM BZDZ_DM_PL P WHERE P.OBJECTID = #objectid#
SELECT COUNT(T.MLDZID) FROM BZDZ_ADD_MLDZDXB T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.DMDM = #dmdm#

SELECT T.DMDM AS ID, T.DMMC AS TEXT,T.DMPY AS PY FROM BZDZ_ADD_DMXXB T, BZDZ_ADD_DMZZJGB Z ,BZDZ_ADD_DMXZQHB X WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND Z.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.DMDM = Z.DMDM AND T.DMDM = X.DMDM
X.XZQHDM = #xzqhdm#
Z.PCSDM = #pcsdm#

SELECT T.ORGCODE AS ID, T.ORGNAME AS TEXT, T.ORGNAMEPY AS PY FROM ORG_ORGANIZATION T WHERE T.XT_ZXBZ = '0' AND T.ORGLEVEL = '50' AND T.ORGBIZTYPE = '10'
T.ORGCODE LIKE SUBSTR(#pcsdm#, 1, 8) || '%'
